Moo::VisualSplitter

Moo::VisualSplitter Class Reference

This class is a helper class that will split rendersets so that each one is affected by less than a set number of bones. More...

#include <visual_splitter.hpp>

class  RenderSet
 Interface class of the output rendersets. More...

Detailed Description

This class is a helper class that will split rendersets so that each one is affected by less than a set number of bones.
